name: My Example Source
subtitle: A source for all of my apps
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: Spotify
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.
